scenes.background: You are on annual leave, enjoying some time off. A colleague messages you about an urgent task.
scenes.description: 'Hey, sorry to bother you, but we have an urgent task that needs your immediate attention.'

options.text: I understand the urgency, but I'll need to finish my leave. Can someone else handle it?
options.analysis: You show good self-regulation by prioritizing your leave, but empathy could be improved by considering the urgency.

options.text: I'll help with the task, but I'll need some support to get it done quickly.
options.analysis: You show high empathy and emotional perception by agreeing to help but may overextend yourself, affecting self-regulation.

options.text: I can spare a few hours to help out. Let's coordinate the details.
options.analysis: You balance your time off with work demands, showing good social skills, but emotional perception could be better.
